CREATURES: ^I’m right here, dude. What’s wrong? Why is she back?
^I know it’s crazy, but she was really telling the truth!
^We just fought some big robot monster thing, I don’t even know what it was really.
^She took the thing down, like she’s got magic powers or something!
^Well I mean, of course you fought something, I can see that you guys are hurt, but magic powers? Weird monsters?
^It’s more like tech enhancements than anything-
^I saw it for myself, Jacke. All this stuff is real.
^I don’t know what that thing we fought was, and neither does she, but she is telling us the truth.
^Wait, Ash, you don’t know what they are?
^Sadly no, I assume they aren’t typical Earth creatures though, judging by Charlie’s reaction.
^They probably came to Earth just like I did, but that’s all I know, and even that is just an assumption.
^Whoa… I have to see this for myself. Why don’t I come with you tomorrow and we’ll go hunt more of these things down?
^I’d love to have some help, thank you!
^Hey, hey, hold on guys… Jacke, I don’t know if I really want you going out there and causing trouble with these things. I don’t want you to get hurt.
^Are you serious?! I’m twenty years old! Don’t treat me like a baby, Char, I got this.
^No way, I need you to stay home and away from whatever those are, at least until we know more about what we’re dealing with.
^You think you’d be better in a fight than me, dude?
^That’s not at all what I’m saying, I just don’t want you to get into a fight at all!
^Why don’t you just let Ash decide then? Ashley, which of us would you wanna take with you to hunt down monsters?
^What?! Don’t let me pick, I just met you guys.
^You don’t have to decide tonight. It’s getting late, how about we go in the morning?
^You mean we go in the morning, as in me and her.
^Regardless! Sounds like a good idea. I’m exhausted.
RAINSTORM: ^I could ask you the same thing. I just couldn’t sleep, I assume it's the same for you?
^I guess, but also… I’ve never seen a storm in person before. I've only heard about them as a child. It’s so strange, why does this happen?
^It’s because the clouds in the sky get too full of water, and it all starts to fall out onto the world below. That’s us.
^I can’t say I understand, but it is really pretty.
^Yeah, I love the rain. Whether I’m in it or I’m just watching and listening to it, it’s got such a calming effect on me.
^I like to imagine that I can just let go of all the stressful stuff when it gets to be too much, kinda like the clouds do.
^It’s why I couldn’t sleep, I think. I’m worried about the thing we saw out there today.
^I really don’t mean to be a jerk about protecting Jacke, I just want to keep them safe. Especially when we have no idea what these things are.
^He seems like a tough kid, maybe you should give him a chance.
^Do what you want, Ash, but if it’s up to me I just… can’t be okay with putting him in danger.
^Thank you, again. For… believing me. And letting me stay here.
^Of course! That’s what I do, I gotta make sure we all stay safe. Try and get some rest, okay?
^I will. You do the same, please.
DECISION: ^Good morning! Come sit, I made breakfast!
^Yeah, yeah, don’t be a kiss-up, Char. Let’s just get to the point. Which one of us are you taking with you today, Ash?

c-0: ^Wooo! That’s what I’m talking about, let’s do this!
^Ugh, fine… Just, promise me you guys will be careful, okay?
c-1: ^Phew… Thanks Ashley, you made the right decision. I promise, I won’t let you down!

ADVENTURE: ^Alright, I think it might be a good start to ask other people if they’ve seen any of these things. We can get a good idea of the scope of this issue.
SHOPINTRO: ^Welcome to my little shop, young lady. How can I help you?
^We’re wondering if you’ve seen anything strange lately. Spot any strange creatures roaming around last night?
^One? I saw a whole slew of those things wandering around in the forest behind my ranch.
^I got almost no sleep last night because I was worried that whatever they were, they’d be a threat to my animals and my crops.
^I can’t afford to be losing out on perfectly good products just because some weird pests wanna get a taste for free!

b: ^Maybe we should ask this guy to bring us to his ranch and see what we can find there. What do you think?
^Sounds like as good a lead as any.
^Why don’t you let us take a look for you? Maybe we can get them to leave the ranch alone!
^We’d be happy to take that problem off your hands for a good discount.

SHOPINTRO: ^Oh! Are you two some kind of extermination service? I’d be happy to show you to my ranch so you can fend off the unwanted vermin.
^Wasn’t too thrilled about heading out to the shop today anyways… I’m worried about my little beauties!
^I’ll be happy to pay you for helping me out. Come with me, we’ll head there now.
TOWN_A: ^Have you seen any strange creatures recently?
^Um… No? Unless you count rats, I’ve seen tons of those in that alley over there. They ain’t that strange though, mostly just nasty.
TOWN_B: ^I was wondering if you’ve heard of any strange sightings of monsters recently.
^I can’t say I have. Honestly I feel like the city’s too noisy to hear anything other than cars honking and people yelling all the time.
^Maybe at night there was a bit more hustle and bustle than usual, but I certainly didn’t see anything weird.
TOWN_C: ^Seen anything unusual lately? Like a strange monster of some kind?
RANCH: ^Here we are! Feel free to take a look around, just be careful, alright? Don’t want any harm coming to my crops or my sweet animals.
^I saw those things you were talking about coming from the forest over there. Think you could start there, see what you can spot?
ENCOUNTER_C: ^Jacke, no! Crap, I never wanted this to happen… we’ve gotta save them!
^We’ve done it before and we’ll do it again, let’s do this!
ENCOUNTER_J: ^Oh my god, those things are freaky! We gotta help Charlie!
^Don’t worry, we’ve got this. Just follow my lead, Jacke!
POSTFIGHT_C: ^Jacke! Are you okay? I’m so sorry-
^Charlie, I’m fine. I had it handled!
^I mean, it kinda didn’t seem like it…
^This is why I didn’t want you coming along with us, you’re gonna get hurt!
^Are you blaming me for getting jumped by a freaky alien robot?
^You could have just stayed at home! I can’t be in two places at once, I needed to help Ashley.
^I didn’t ask for your protection! So what, I got caught off guard by something unlike anything I’ve ever seen before, and that makes me helpless?
^To be fair, Jacke was a big help near the end of that fight, maybe we oughta give them more credit.
^Thank you, Ash… You gotta stop treating me like I’m a baby, Char. Whatever’s been going on is weird, yeah, but I wanna be a part of this.
^Don’t leave me out of it like I’m some little kid. I can protect myself and you just fine.
^Jacke’s right. We made it out of there because we all worked together! I know you both want to protect each other, but aren’t we better as a unit?
^You know what? You’re right. I’ve been kind of a jerk, that’s on me.
^We’ll all be safer in the long run if we stick together, so that seems like the best choice to me.
^For now, we should go collect that reward the shopkeeper offered us, now that we stopped the robots from attacking his farm.
^Reward? And I’ll get a cut of that, right? After all, I did, uhh, help you find them?
^We’re a team now! You’re all in, Jacke. Let’s get moving!
POSTFIGHT_J: ^Guys… Thank you for saving me. Jacke, I think you should head home. It’s getting real dicey out here. Ashley and I can handle this from here.
^Are you serious? I just saved your butt, dude.

s: ^We did it together, all three of us. I think we all deserve to take some credit.
^Charlie, I think you oughta give Jacke a little more credit.

c-1: ^I couldn’t have done it without him, after all.
g-0: ^But I… Oh alright, I can admit when I’m wrong… You did really great out there, Jacke.
^I’m sorry I didn’t have faith in you, I just didn’t want you to get involved in all this dangerous alien stuff.
^You gotta remember that I’m not a kid anymore, Char. Whatever’s been going on is weird, yeah, but I wanna be a part of this.
^Don’t leave me out of it like I’m some little kid. I can protect myself and you just fine.
^Let’s not forget which of us was just in the jaws of some creepy robot monster…
^Jacke’s right. We made it out of there because we all worked together! I know you both want to protect each other, but aren’t we better as a unit?
^You know what? You’re right. I’ve been kind of a jerk, that’s on me.
^We’ll all be safer in the long run if we stick together, so that seems like the best choice to me.
^Glad you came around, man. Now what'd you say we go collect that sweet reward from that ranch guy?

QUEST_END: ^Oh! Is everything taken care of back there?
^Yes sir, you should be safe for the time being.
^Thank you all, kindly. Here, take this as a thank you. Now I know just who to call when these monsters are givin’ me trouble!
^You just let us know, sir. We’re happy to help!
^Yeah, you keep prizes like this coming and I’ll take out robots in the forest for you anytime.
^For sure! You all just head back home, now. I should be all set here for now!
^And be sure to stop by my shop anytime, my friends! Be safe on your journeys!
BACK_HOME: ^What. A. Day. I need a nap.
^Today's definitely been a lot. We'll sleep good tonight, I'm sure.
^What's going to happen now? Should we go out again tomorrow to find more monsters?
^Well I know I can't, I have work all day tomorrow.
^Ugh, and I have classes in the morning. Why'd ya have to remind me?
^Wait, you guys are both busy? I'll have to go back out there myself...
^Or... You could take a break. You probably need it, Ash. You've been nonstop since you got here.
^I'm actually with Jacke on this one. The world isn't gonna fall apart in one day. If you want, you could come to work with me!
^That way you can have a little change of scenery and think about Earth things besides protecting it from scary robots.
^If you aren't feeling Charlie's boring diner, you can come sit in on my classes with me.
^You into engineering? I mean, you are a robot alien girl.
^I'm kidding! You know what I mean. It could be fuuuun!
^It's up to you at the end of the day, Ashley. If you wanna head into the forest again, go for it.
^But our offers are there if you want to see what else Earth has in store for you!
